query: SELECT id, slug, name, siteType, LEFT(htmlContent, 500) as html_preview FROM hostedSites WHERE slug LIKE '%elegance%' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LnWcAriB6UDfVBW.root --database 6TyQvWdwhpeQGG2hvgWtQa --execute SELECT id, slug, name, siteType, LEFT(htmlContent, 500) as html_preview FROM hostedSites WHERE slug LIKE '%elegance%' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
